Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.debug.ui.ILaunchConfigurationTab

  • Packages that use ILaunchConfigurationTab 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.debug.ui
    Provides a generic debugger user interface that clients may customize via standard workbench extension points.
    org.eclipse.debug.ui.sourcelookup
    Provides a user interface for debug platform source lookup facilities.

    • Uses of ILaunchConfigurationTab in org.eclipse.debug.ui

      Subinterfaces of ILaunchConfigurationTab in org.eclipse.debug.ui 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  ILaunchConfigurationTab2
      Optional enhancements for ILaunchConfigurationTab.
      Classes in org.eclipse.debug.ui that implement ILaunchConfigurationTab 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractLaunchConfigurationTab
      Common function for launch configuration tabs.
      class  CommonTab
      Launch configuration tab used to specify the location a launch configuration is stored in, whether it should appear in the favorites list, and perspective switching behavior for an associated launch.
      class  EnvironmentTab
      Launch configuration tab for configuring the environment passed into Runtime.exec(...) when a config is launched.
      class  PrototypeTab
      Launch configuration tab used to specify the prototype associated with a launch configuration, and also listed attributes from prototype shared with the launch configuration.
      class  RefreshTab
      A launch configuration tab which allows the user to specify which resources should be refreshed when the launch terminates.
      class  WorkingDirectoryBlock
      A control for setting the working directory associated with a launch configuration.
      Fields in org.eclipse.debug.ui declared as ILaunchConfigurationTab 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected ILaunchConfigurationTab[] AbstractLaunchConfigurationTabGroup.fTabs
      The tabs in this tab group, or null if not yet instantiated.
      Methods in org.eclipse.debug.ui that return ILaunchConfigurationTab 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ILaunchConfigurationTab ILaunchConfigurationDialog.getActiveTab()
      Returns the currently active ILaunchConfigurationTab being displayed, or null if there is none.
      ILaunchConfigurationTab[] AbstractLaunchConfigurationTabGroup.getTabs()  
      ILaunchConfigurationTab[] ILaunchConfigurationDialog.getTabs()
      Returns the tabs currently being displayed, or null if none.
      ILaunchConfigurationTab[] ILaunchConfigurationTabGroup.getTabs()
      Returns the tabs contained in this tab group.
      Methods in org.eclipse.debug.ui with parameters of type ILaunchConfigurationTab 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ILaunchConfigurationDialog.setActiveTab​(ILaunchConfigurationTab tab)
      Sets the displayed tab to the given tab.
      protected void AbstractLaunchConfigurationTabGroup.setTabs​(ILaunchConfigurationTab... tabs)
      Sets the tabs in this group

    • Uses of ILaunchConfigurationTab in org.eclipse.debug.ui.sourcelookup

      Classes in org.eclipse.debug.ui.sourcelookup that implement ILaunchConfigurationTab 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SourceLookupTab
      A launch configuration tab that displays and edits the source lookup path for a launch configuration.
